Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Still on it, haha. Currently waiting on a few PRs though.

Maybe there’s nothing here that’s new to you, but you might be interested in this recent AMS article. Is there anything here that you might add to your queue of things to PR?

https://www.ams.org/journals/notices/202207/rnoti-p1145.pdf

Or, for that matter, this more extensive article by Ehrlich?

http://qcpages.qc.cuny.edu/~rmiller/Ehrlich.pdf
